&ExportImportTemplateQuery;
if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_gt_dvcs' and val = '1') select '1' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName; else select '0' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQueryReturnFileName;

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where ngay_ks >= @dateCurrent)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_yt
field.check: ma_yt not in (select ma_yt from xdmyt b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or @costUnit = '0')

field.name: ma_bp0
field.check: ma_bp0 <> '' and ma_bp0 not in (select ma_bp from vxdmbp where truc_tiep = '0' and ma_bp in (select ma_bp from dmbp))

field.name: ma_bp
